KPlugin.Name: FZF File Search
KPlugin.Description: 使用 fzf 搜索文件

triggerWord.label: Trigger Word
triggerWord.description: The word that triggers the fzf file search. Use 'fz' for default opener, 'fzv' for VS Code.

fdExecutable.label: fd Executable Path
fdExecutable.description: The full path to the fd executable.

fzfExecutable.label: fzf Executable Path
fzfExecutable.description: The full path to the fzf executable.

includeHidden.label: Include Hidden Files
includeHidden.description: Whether to include hidden files and directories in the search.

excludeGit.label: Exclude .git Directories
excludeGit.description: Whether to exclude .git directories from the search.

exactMatch.label: Use Exact Match
exactMatch.description: Whether to use exact matching in fzf.

noSort.label: Disable Sorting in fzf
noSort.description: Whether to disable sorting in fzf.

timeout.label: Timeout (ms)
timeout.description: The timeout in milliseconds for the fzf search.
